definitions: a tropical American bird of the cotinga family, with loud explosive calls. There are wattles on the head of the male.

notes.text: Genus Procnias, family Cotingidae: four species

shortDefinitions: tropical American bird of cotinga family

definitions: any of a number of Australasian songbirds with a ringing call.

notes.text: ('New Zealand bellbird') a New Zealand honeyeater (Anthornis melanura, family Meliphagidae)
('crested bellbird') an Australian whistler (Oreoica gutturalis, family Pachycephalidae)
